app_descript:
Brief: Join the collective effort against the pandemic with "COVID Defense," a free mobile application designed to enhance community protection against COVID-19 by notifying users of potential exposures. This app represents a collaborative initiative utilizing an open-source platform developed by PathCheck Foundation to ensure your safety and the safety of those around you.
